events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on April 30th, involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing initial details about the vehicle collision and property damage.
An insurance claims agent was assigned to handle the car accident case and initiate contact with the policyholder for next steps.
The customer received acknowledgement of their car accident claim and was informed that the investigation would begin shortly.
The agent requested the submission of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and witness statements to proceed with the claim.
The customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and the official police accident report for evaluation.
An investigation into the car collision circumstances started, with the claims team coordinating with automotive experts.
The investigation was completed, confirming fault and estimating damage costs based on vehicle inspection and reports.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair expenses and rental vehicle reimbursement during the fix period.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt settlement proposal and appreciated the clear communication throughout the process.
The claim was officially approved by the underwriting team after verifying all documents and accepting the settlement terms.
Payment for the vehicle repairs was issued directly to the approved auto repair shop as per the final settlement agreement.
The claim was successfully closed after confirming the repairs were completed and the customer had no further concerns.
All claim files and related documents were archived for future reference with secure handling according to company policy.
